product_name: Granite Gear Leopard V.C. 46 Ki Pack - Women's
long_description: Perfect for light and fast weekend adventures, the women's Granite Gear Leopard V.C. 46 Ki pack offers blissful comfort and 35 lb. capacity so you can focus on the scenery instead of your pack weight. Thoughtfully designed fit features a women-specific torso length, shoulder straps and hipbelt for comfort and performance. Vapor Current suspension features a molded back panel with channels that allow air to circulate from bottom to top for effective evaporative cooling. Main compartment features a hydration sleeve and port (reservoir sold separately), roll-top closure and a removable floating lid with an internal mesh pocket. Gear organization includes tool loops, external flap with axe cinches and 2 zippered pockets, zippered stretch-woven front pocket and stretch-woven wand pockets. Granite Gear Leopard V.C. 46 Ki pack is made with 100- and 210-denier high-tenacity Cordura nylon.
short_description: Perfect for light and fast weekend adventures, the women's Granite Gear Leopard V.C. 46 Ki pack offers blissful comfort and 35 lb. capacity so you can focus on the scenery instead of your pack weight.
